name: SPAZ
description:
Welcome to SPAZ moderating! Trust me, it's easy :)

Playable with just a <MOUSE> (optional typing too)
Play in fullscreen for an epic experience!

WARNING: Contains a little bit of spooky scary images.

Made by Austin, Devyn, and Derek. Thanks for checking out our 2nd jam!

If you get the error call_indirect to a null table entry (evaluating 'Module["asm"]["Hi"].apply(null,arguments)') then play the game at this link: https://onsclom.github.io/benBonkGameJam/

Special Thanks:

Gavin Brooks - Game Music. Check out his work!

Jack Oakley - Pixel Inversion font

Daniel Linssen - m6x11 and m3x5 fonts
